content: crochet elegant cotton doily - in days gone by doilies used to be crocheted more in fine delicate yarns these days they can be made in thicker cottons etc and have a variety of uses hope you enjoy making this one the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 11 inch diameter level intermediate copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/elegant-crochet-cotton-doily/
